entry.title: https://github.com/nf-core/scdownstream
entry.content: A single cell transcriptomics pipeline for QC, integration and making the data presentable

entry.title: https://github.com/nf-core/fastquorum
entry.content: Pipeline to produce consensus reads using unique molecular indexes/barcodes (UMIs)

entry.title: https://github.com/nf-core/scrnaseq
entry.content: A single-cell RNAseq pipeline for 10X genomics data

entry.title: https://github.com/nf-core/oncoanalyser
entry.content: A comprehensive cancer DNA/RNA analysis and reporting pipeline

entry.title: https://github.com/nf-core/nanoseq
entry.content: Nanopore demultiplexing, QC and alignment pipeline

entry.title: https://github.com/nf-core/methylseq
entry.content: Methylation (Bisulfite-Sequencing) analysis pipeline using Bismark or bwa-meth + MethylDackel

entry.title: https://github.com/nf-core/rnaseq
entry.content: RNA sequencing analysis pipeline using STAR, RSEM, HISAT2 or Salmon with gene/isoform counts and extensive quality control.

entry.title: https://github.com/nf-core/sarek
entry.content: Analysis pipeline to detect germline or somatic variants (pre-processing, variant calling and annotation) from WGS / targeted sequencing

entry.title: https://github.com/nf-core/differentialabundance
entry.content: Differential abundance analysis for feature/ observation matrices from platforms such as RNA-seq

entry.title: https://github.com/nf-core/modules
entry.content: Repository to host tool-specific module files for the Nextflow DSL2 community!
